MaterialityStakeholder.name: MaterialityStakeholder
MaterialityStakeholder.description: Represents information about a stakeholder who can be internal or external party having interest in a company. A stakeholder can either affect or be affected by the business.

BusinessRegion.description: The business region in which the stakeholder operates.

CategoryId.description: The category ID of the stakeholder.

CompanyNameId.description: The name of the stakeholder's company.

ContactId.description: The contact associated with the stakeholder.

InformationSource.description: The source of the stakeholder information.

IsInternal.description: Indicates whether the stakeholder is internal or external (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MaterialityAssessmentId.description: The materiality assessment associated with the stakeholder.

ProxyUserId.description: The user who submitted the survey responses on behalf of the stakeholder.

Status.description: The status of the stakeholder's response.

UserId.description: The user associated with the stakeholder.

WeightingPercent.description: The percentage weighting given to the relevant responses provided by the stakeholder.
